newsitem.title: USA: Logal does not expect to meet Q3 estimates.
newsitem.headline: Logal does not expect to meet Q3 estimates.

text.p: Logal Educational Software & Systems Ltd said on Monday that it does not expect to meet analysts' revenue and earnings estimates of $0.05 in the third quarter ending September 30, due primarily to a shortfall in revenues from outside sales channels.
The company said that although orders for its products have been increasing in the past several weeks, it expects to incur a loss for the quarter.
The company said that due to the significant amount of time remaining in the quarter, it was unable to estimate the exact amount of loss.

Logal Educational intends to focus its outside sales force on selling large Internet-based installations at the school district, university, and state levels and has also hired four additional salespeople to concentrate sales efforts at the school level.
